title: BOTS... ARE...OUT...OF...CONTROL
body:
WAKE
UP
RIOT.

THEY 
ARE 
EVERYWHERE

replies.body: Yes, lately it seems like 5 to 6 players in each TFT game are bots, they are all river sprites with no icon... Riot what is happening?

> [{quoted}](name=Say No to Krugs,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=46cuabUE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2020-02-11T05:10:50.705+0000)
>
> Yes, lately it seems like 5 to 6 players in each TFT game are bots, they are all river sprites with no icon... Riot what is happening?

i mean any mention of it on reddit gets deleted by mods but yeah its getting ridiculous
